QuestData.Title: Deanimate the Reanimated
QuestData.Description: The admiral's asked me to take care of a major problem, but my specialty's in healing, not fighting!$B$BThe pandaren in the camp here have told me that something is animating the statues to the northeast at Mogujia.$B$BWill you help me out, $n? We can't afford to have a fight with an army of statues right now.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy any 14 Terracotta Warriors or Terracotta Guardians.
QuestData.CompletionText: Please tell me that you have the Mogujia situation under control. Please?
QuestData.RewardText: Alright! Looks like we won't have a bunch of statues to worry about any more. Good work, $p!
